text: Alberto-Culver was an American corporation. Its brands included Alberto VO5, Andrew Collnge, St. Ives (skin care products), TRESemm√©, FDS, Consort, Nexxus, Toni, and White Rain. It was a manufacturer in the multicultural beauty care market with such brands as Soft & Beautiful, Just For Me, Motions, and TCB. It was founded in 1955. It was bought by Unilever in 2010. Category:Companies based in Illinois Category:Defunct companies of the United States category: 1955 establishments in the United States category: 2010 disestablishments in the United States
title: Alberto-Culver
